  • Maybe in reply to: David J. Fiander: "First cut at Functional Requirements document" 
> Yes, I think "Web interface to version control systems" or even "Web
> interface to document management systems".

I guess I've been kind of focused on the details, rather than
the forest.  This does let me go into some stuff that I was
having a hard time avoiding (which I was avoiding because it
didn't fit my title).  I'll try for

        F.R. for Web Access to Version Control Systems

- David
